item.title: Happy leap second (or mostly happy) and happy new year for 2017
item.description: Happy new year, and from a technology perspective, also happy leap second. [image: timekeeping for the leap second, from FSM Labs] Here's a complete picture of #leapsecond 2016. pic.twitter.com/DFp6XgnPig — FSMLabs (@FSMLabs) January 1, 2017 As always, when there’s a leap second, people get a chance to debug their timekeeping code. I guess if they happen frequently enough the code will get better exercise and some bugs will be shaken out.
